body_html:
I just found that my actual experiment (not the toy example above) using Net2 crashed at the beginning of the second epoch because of Out of Memory. Between the first and second epochs it evaluated the performance on the validation set, which might have consumed some memory so that the second epoch didn't have enough memory to run.

The RNN module seems really thirsty on memory, or maybe I did something wrong...

body:
I just found that my actual experiment (not the toy example above) using Net2 crashed at the beginning of the second epoch because of Out of Memory. Between the first and second epochs it evaluated the performance on the validation set, which might have consumed some memory so that the second epoch didn't have enough memory to run.

The RNN module seems really thirsty on memory, or maybe I did something wrong...
